attributes.action: Establish conditional and codified law for huge numbers residing in UK illegally
attributes.additional_details:
As a Financial return, if Gov sets the case cost 3000£ inc NHS, it’ll get millions due to huge number of residents illegally in the country. This return will come in all periods of visa renewal. Further more, the taxes will be collected annually from this number who never paid.
The country will have a large workforce in various fields to compensate for Brexit.
As a human aspect this will allow them to visit their family freely.
Security, Gov will have information on all residents of the Kingdom.
attributes.background: I suggest to the Gov to establish a law that is conditional on residents of the UK illegally by issuing a certain type of visa to those who can get a legal job opportunity and pay taxes.This visa doesn’t allow access for benefits or student finance and not to be renewed if the applicant stop working

rejection.details:
We think these petitions are similar

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/627469
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/624247

If you'd like something different, such as offering the proposed visa immediately, you could set that out clearly in a new petition.
